nodes.bodyText: Is the parameter injection of User not supported anymore?
Yes, I tried to figure out this but really could not find where this is configured. Do you have any idea about where this is defined?

You can find this under the mvc package in dhis-web-api, it also has argument resolvers for DhisApiVersion etc.
CurrentUserHandlerMethodArgumentResolver
No need for @Autowired if using constructor injection (since spring 4.3)

Does two-factor still work?
If yes, remove commented code?
Yes, two factor works but only via form login. This provider is for oauth2 access token login
Handle this. Do we need it? Remove commented code if not.
